description: Introduce the kids to Japanese flavours with bite-sized sushi balls. These fun, colourful balls are nutritionally approved and great for snacking on.
name: Japanese Rice Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using damp hands, roll heaped tablespoonfuls of rice mixture into 16 balls. Roll balls in nori to lightly coat. Place on a large plate. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or until firm. Serve.
